actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
	"itemId" AS value,
	CASE
		WHEN "itemId" = 1 THEN 'GT尾翼 A'
		WHEN "itemId" = 2 THEN '车种专用 A'
		WHEN "itemId" = 3 THEN 'GT 尾翼 B'
		WHEN "itemId" = 4 THEN '车种专用 B'
		WHEN "itemId" = 5 THEN 'GT 尾翼 C'
		WHEN "itemId" = 6 THEN 'GT 尾翼 D'
		WHEN "itemId" = 7 THEN '车种专用 C'
		WHEN "itemId" = 8 THEN 'GT 尾翼 E'
		ELSE '未知尾翼，请向管理员报告此错误'
	END AS label
FROM public."CarItem"
WHERE "carId" = {{SelectCarId.selectedOptionValue}} AND "category" = 5
UNION
SELECT
    0 AS value,
    '原厂尾翼样式/无尾翼' AS label
UNION
SELECT
    127 AS value,
    '自定义GT尾翼' AS label
ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT pg_sleep(3);
